column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday April 3 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: UPDATE:  Traffic Alert for I-75 near Exit 104 in Fayette Co:
column4: The roadway is temporarily back open, but expected to be closed again at about 3 p.m. for additional line work.

column3: UPDATE:  Traffic Alert for I-75 near Exit 104 in Fayette Co:
column4: Southbound traffic is backed up to Exit 108 (Man O War).

column3: UPDATE:  Traffic Alert for I-75 near Exit 104 in Fayette Co:
column4: Northbound traffic is backed up toward the Clays Ferry Bridge.
